structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXIX. NW 79TH STREET CORRIDOR COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY

text.section:
Sec. 2-2099. Appointments.
The Board hereby appoints the following persons, whose resumes are attached to and incorporated by reference as Exhibit A to Ordinance No. 11-55, to the position of commissioners of the Agency and designates their initial terms to be as follows:
Amy Lee: One (1) year.
Oliver Gross: Two (2) years.
Ron Butler: Three (3) years.
Yolly Roberson: Four (4) years.
Dorothea Nichson: Four (4) years.
The Board hereby designates Dorothea Nichson as Chair and Yolly Roberson as Vice Chair of the Agency.
All future appointments of chairs, vice-chairs and members of the Agency shall be made by resolution of the Board.
